    • Constructor Detail

        public Connect4View()

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Displays the view for the game board. Pane object with circles represent game pieces and are clickable to place a new disk.
        Specified by:
        start in class javafx.application.Application

      • connect4Menu

        public void connect4Menu(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Menu display for new game. Allows users to create a server or connect as a client and choose the server and port. Users can choose to play as a human or computer.

      • connectToServerAsComp

        public void connectToServerAsComp(java.lang.String serverName,
                                  int port)
        Connects to the server and runs a thread that takes connect4MoveMessage's from the server that represents moves made by the other user. If the connect4MoveMessage has 3 as its player number that means the other player won and ends the game. Calls runComp which starts a thread for a computer to play and make moves.

      • connectToServerAsPlayer

        public void connectToServerAsPlayer(java.lang.String serverName,
                                    int port)
        Connects to the server and starts a thread that takes connect4MoveMessages from the server. If a message has the player number as 3 then it ends the game.

      • runComp

        public void runComp()
        Runs a thread that represents the computer and the moves it makes. The computer picks a random column to place its disk.

      • findPoint

        public javafx.scene.layout.Pane findPoint(int x,
                                          int y)

      • insertCircle

        public void insertCircle(int x,
                         int y,
                         int color)
        Places a new circle in the place that x and y point to. Then it sends a message to the server to send to the other player in order to update its board with the new piece. Displays a message saying the player won if they put a piece in a game winning position.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable o,
                   java.lang.Object arg)
        Updates the view by calling methods to place the new disk.
        Specified by:
        update in interface java.util.Observer
